title: Salmon and haddock fishcake on buttered spinach with sorrel sauce
ingredients: milk, for poaching the haddock (seasoned with ½ onion, 1 sliced carrot, 1 bay leaf, 4 peppercorns and 2 cloves)
2 small onions, finely diced and sweated in butter
salt and freshly ground black pepper
breadcrumbs from white or brown bread
handful of sorrel, washed and wilted in butter and finely chopped, following instructions for spinach
